name: OBERIG.COM
description:
Oberig.com is an IT outsourcing company. With its headquarters in Slovenia and a development center in Eastern Europe, our team has 15 years of experience providing a wide range of IT services to our clients.
As a company, we want to grow. As a team, we want to offer the best services on the market. We can quickly and easily set a new client up with one of our teams through an absorption process in which specialists are drawn from a large pool of developers, consultants, system administrators, and creative designers.
Our mission is to provide our clients with high quality IT services that will enable ongoing growth of their businesses. Oberig.com is the right choice for individuals who are looking for a reliable, European-based IT outsourcing partner.
READ MORE...
